bugs.title: CVE-2013-1816 MediaWiki: Pass '2' instead of 'true' to CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2013-1816 MediaWiki: Pass '2' instead of 'true' to CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST

long_desc.thetext:
MediaWiki reports:

(bug 44135/bug 42441) Pass '2' instead of 'true' to CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST
https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/show_bug.cgi?id=44135
https://bugzilla.wikimedia.org/show_bug.cgi?id=42441

Created mediawiki119 tracking bugs for this issue

Affects: epel-6 [bug 917919]

Affects: fedora-18 [bug 917920]
mediawiki119-1.19.4-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
